item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
A Helhirding is a sacred warrior of a Helhird. The Helhird once served a dead god and could be seen as a spectral formation watching over triumphant armies, ready to slay routing soldiers. Now the Helhird serves the Hanged Kings of Helhalla.
